ygData.subject: Re: Kith Nerfed!!!  Re: Undead drops in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know if I d call this nerfing , but they did the same to lesser fay as well.  Now you can see quite a ways if your clipping pane is pushed way
ygData.messageBody:
James Schuldes wrote:

> From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>
>
> Gahk! Have you been in Kith since the patch??? They have totally NERFED
> it!
>
> It nearly completely light in there! WTF? Man I needed some spell to cloud
> my vision! Granted I do got my clipping plane set to max viewing distance
> but come on now - this is ridiculous!

I don't know if I'd call this "nerfing", but they did the same to lesser fay as well. Now you
can see quite a ways if your clipping pane is pushed way back.

Jyzan
